title: Decrease in what leads to deficit

content.question: A decrease in which of the following would most likely move a balanced government budget to a deficit in the short run?

topic.text: 5.4: Government Deficits and the National Debt

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
